name: Phlight - The journey home
description:
Phlight was an entry and winner of the 2015 STEM Video Game Challenge, an awesome competition to get kids into game development.

I was working on procedural planets and stuff, but got distracted with other projects and moved on. The game build never got released until now.

It doesn't take long to play through and has a pretty simple story, but it's kinda neat and you might enjoy it.

It's made with Haxe and Haxeflixel.

Cheers!
